name: Umay Study #1.3
description:
Memo Akten (memo.tv), 2021
Wild fires are currently tearing up the world, & many countries are seeing the worst fires on record. In my home country TR, 10s of 1000s of acres of coastal forest is up in flames.
Unrelated - having grown up & currently living in this area - I've been drawing inspiration from the life and soil of this region, starting with photogrammetric 3D scans of olive trees. 
Due to these devastating losses, I'm minting a few early studies, & throughout Aug 2021, every penny from the sale of these will go to the charities & volunteers working with displaced / injured animals. 
(SOUND ON)
